src_original: tasya navabhir yathaiva srotaāpattiphalasya.  śraddhādibhir ājñātāvīndriyavarjyaiḥ.  manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ ceti pūrvavat vyākhyānaṃ.
tgt_original: 復有阿羅漢果信等，除未知欲知根、意根，樂、喜、捨根中隨一，由此九根得後際果。

src_original: ihānupūrvako [Tib.104b] yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ ca prāpya anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.  yo vā bhūyovītarāgo bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalam alabdhvaiva sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva ca labdhvānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.  sa ca yadi laukikena mārgeṇa prāpnoti.
tgt_original: 釋曰： 斯陀含果、阿那含果，觀前後故名中。

src_original: tasya saptabhir indriyaiḥ prāptiḥ.
tgt_original: 此二果一一至得，由七八九根。 云何如此？

src_original: yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānupūrvikīyasyety abhipretaṃ.
tgt_original: 斯陀含果，若人次第修方得。

src_original: śraddhādibhiḥ paṃcabhir manaupekṣendriyābhyāṃ cety arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 若依世間道，此果由七根得，信等五根并捨意二根。

src_original: atha lokottareṇa mārgeṇa tasyāṣṭābhis tathaiveti.  yathā sakṛdāgāmiphalasyaivāṣṭābhir ity arthaḥ.  ājñendriyam aṣṭamaṃ bhavatīti.
tgt_original: 若依出世道，此果由八根得，七如前，知根為第八。

src_original: kāmadhātumātravītarāgo laukikena mārgeṇa navame prakāre prahīṇe prathamād api vā dhyānād yāvad ākiṃcanyād api vā viṭarāgo yo 'nāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.  tasya navabhiḥ prāptiḥ.
tgt_original: 若先多離欲人方得此果，由九根得。 如得須陀洹果，阿那含果若人次第修方得。 若依世間道，此果由七根得，如前所說。

src_original: yathā srotaāpattiphalasya.  srotaāpattiphalasya hi darśanamārgeṇa prāptiḥ.
tgt_original: 得斯陀含果，若依出世道，此果由八根得，亦如前所說。

src_original: ayaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ.  sakhasaumanasyopekṣendriyāṇām anyatamaṃ bhavati.  niśrayaviśeṣād iti.  yadi tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati.
tgt_original: 得斯陀含果，此果與前果有異，謂樂、喜、捨隨一根相應，由依止差別故。

src_original: sa navame vimuktimārge dhyānaṃ praviśati maulaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa tadāpy aṣṭābhir indriyair anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti.
tgt_original: 若入根本定，依世間道，是時由八根得阿那含果。

src_original: tad yadi dauḥśīlyād abhikṣur eva syāt.  sa na syāt.  na hi tasya punar upasaṃpādanaṃ kriyate.
tgt_original: 若由破戒成非比丘，不應成與學比丘。

src_original: bhikṣuś ca sa vyavasthāpyate.  tasmān na dauḥśīlyād abhikṣutvam iti.  na vayaṃ brūmaḥ.  sahādhyāpattyā abrahmacaryād eva sarvaḥ pārājiko bhavati.
tgt_original: 我等不說，一切犯戒人由犯戒事即成波羅夷； 若波羅夷人，必定非比丘。

src_original: kiṃ na punaḥ pravrājyate.  anikṣiptaśikṣa ity adhyāhāryaṃ.
tgt_original: 若波羅夷非比丘，云何不更許出家？

src_original: tīvrānapatrāpyavipāditatvāt.  tīvreṇānapatrāpyeṇa vipāditāsya saṃtatiḥ.  tasyāḥ saṃtater evaṃ vipāditatvāt saṃvarasyābhavyatvaṃ.  tasmān na punaḥ pravrājyata ity adhikāraḥ.  na tu khalu bhikṣubhāvāpekṣayā.  na tu khalu tasya bhikṣubhāvo 'stīty apekṣayā na pravrājyate.
tgt_original: 由相續為最重無慚羞所壞，於護不能感生故，如焦種子，不由觀有比丘法故。

src_original: yathā jvālāyāḥ śabdasya vā gamanam.
tgt_original: 譬如光聲相續，於別處生說名行。

src_original: kāraṇasādṛśyena kāryātmalābhāt.  akurvad api kiṃcid iti.  parispandam akurvad apīty arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 悉無所作。 如識果隨似因，悉無所作，但由得相似體故說如此。 說識識境亦爾，悉無所作，但由得相似體。

src_original: vijñāne kāraṇabhāvād iti.  (Abhidh-k-vy 713) vijñānaṃ vijñānāntarsya kāraṇam.  ato vijñānāntaram utpādād vijānātīty ucyate.
tgt_original: 復次此中識相續，由於後識是因故，說識識境。

src_original: kāraṇe kartṛśabdaniveśād iti.  kāraṇaṃ kartṛbhūtam iti kṛtvā.  tadyathā nādasya kāraṇaṃ ghaṇṭeti ghaṇṭā rautīty ucyate.
tgt_original: 此言無失，由於因中立作者名故，譬如說鈴正鳴。

src_original: sa deśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ saṃtānarūpaḥ pradīpadeśāntareṣūtpadyamānaḥ.  taṃtaṃ deśaṃ gacchatīty ucyate.
tgt_original: 云何燈行？ 於光相續，假名說燈。 此相續正生於餘處，說燈行餘處。

src_original: evaṃ cittānāṃ saṃtāne vijñānam ity upacaryate.
tgt_original: 如此於心相續，假名說識。

src_original: ekam iveti kṛtvā.  tat saṃtānarūpaṃ vijñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣūtpadyamānaṃ taṃtaṃ viṣayaṃ vijānātīty ucyate.  saṃtānena vijñānotpattyā vijānātīty abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 此心相續於餘塵中生識，此識彼塵。

src_original: yathā vā rūpaṃ bhavatīti vistaraḥ.  yathā bhavitū rūpasya bhāvāj janitur jāteḥ sthātuḥ sthiter anarthāntaratvam.
tgt_original: 復次譬如世間說，色有色生色住。 此中能有等、不異有等，亦有二言。

src_original: evaṃ vijñāne 'pi syāt.
tgt_original: 於識二言亦爾。

src_original: vijñātur vijñānasya bhāvād anarthāntaratvaṃ.  vyatiriktasya bhāvasyānupalabdheḥ.  vaiśeṣikasūtrānusārād vā.  nātmana iti.  yadi nātmano vijñānam utpadyate vijñānalakṣaṇasyāviśeṣāt tādṛśam eva vijñānam utpadyeta.  yadi tv ātmanaḥ tasyābhiprāyaviśeṣād viśiṣṭaṃ jñānam utpadyetety abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 若從識識生，不從我生，云何生不恒似本？

src_original: na ca kramaniyameneti.  kasmāc ca na kramaniyamenotpadyate.  aniyamenāpi hy utpadyate gobuddher anantaraṃ strībhuddhiḥ.  strībuddher mahiṣabhuddhiḥ.  kasmād gobuddhir evānantaraṃ notpadyate.
tgt_original: 又不由決定次第生？

src_original: aṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti.  aṃkurāt kāṇḍa evotpadyate [Tib.378b] na pattrādi.  kāṇḍāt pattram evotpadyate na puṣpādy aṃkurādi vā.  tadvat.
tgt_original: 譬如芽節葉等，由住異諸行相故，一切有為法性皆如此，必定相續不同。

src_original: na paropakrameṇety abhiprāyaḥ.  evam anena kasmān na nityaṃ sadṛśam evotpadyata ity yat pṛṣṭaṃ.
tgt_original: 一切相續與初剎那不異故，後時不應自然出定。

src_original: tad visarjanaṃ.  yat tu pṛṣṭaṃ na ca kramaniyameneti.  tad darśayann āha.  kramo 'pi hi cittānām niyatam eveti.  abhīṣṭam evaitat.
tgt_original: 亦有決定次第心生，若心應從此心生，從此彼必定生故，亦有別心。

src_original: strīcittād iti vistaraḥ.  strīcittāt stryālambanāc cittād anantaraṃ tasyāḥ striyāḥ kāyas tatkāyaḥ.  tatkāyasya vidūsāṇāyai yadi parivrājakasyānyasya vā sādhoś cittam utpannaṃ bhavati.  tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā.  tasyāḥ patiputrādayaḥ.
tgt_original: 譬如從女人心次第若穢污身心生，或此夫及子等心生。

src_original: dvidhāśabdena naiṣyaṃdikavipākajatvaprabhedāv eva prāptīnām ucyete.
tgt_original: 至得有二種，或等流果、或果報果。

src_original: yasya kāyāyatanaṃ.  tasya catvāraḥ.  kāyarūpaspraṣṭavyadharmāyanānīti.  rūpāvinābhāvitvāt rūpāyatanam api tasyaiva cakṣurnirvartakasya (Abhidh-k-vy 215) karmaṇo vipāka iti samayāntaram icchati.  ayaṃ tv ācāryo na rūpāyatanam avaśyaṃ tasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity aparaṃ pakṣam avalaṃbate.  yasya kāyāyatanaṃ.  tasya trīṇi.
tgt_original: 若業感身入果報，此業生三入為果報，謂身觸及法入。

src_original: yasya cakṣurāyatanaṃ.  tasya catvārīti.  na hy anyonyamavinābhāvino jīvitanikāyasabhāgādīny āvaśyakam ekasyaiva karmaṇo vipāka ity abhiprāyaḥ.  tāv etau pakṣau vibhāṣyakārair likhitau.  tayor yo yasmai rocate.
tgt_original: 如此色香味亦爾。 若業感眼根果報，此業生四入為果報，謂眼身觸法入。

src_original: atha kathaṃ kasyacit karmaṇa ekam āyatanaṃ vipāko vipacyate.  kasyacid yāvad ekādaśety ata āha.
tgt_original: 有業感五六七八九十十一入果報。 何以故？

src_original: ādiśabdena duhitrādayo gṛhyante.  tadālambanaṃ cittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ.  tad vānyatarad yad idaṃ tasmāt strīcittād anantam utpannaṃ bhavati.  punaś ca kālāntareṇa saṃtatipariṇāmena strīcittam utpadyate.  tat paścād utpannaṃ strīcittaṃ (Abhidh-k-vy 714) samarthaṃ bhavati tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatstrīkāyavidūṣaṇācittotpādane tatpatiputrādicittotpādane vā samarthaṃ.  kasmād ity [Tib.379a] āha.
tgt_original: 復於後時由相續變異故，更生女人心。

src_original: tadgotratvād iti.  tadkāyavidūsaṇācittaṃ tatpatiputrādicittaṃ vā gotraṃ bījam asyeti tadgotraṃ.  cittaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ.  tasmāt.  tajjātīyatvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
tgt_original: 此心於穢污身心生中，或於此夫及子等心生中有功能，由同性故。

src_original: anyathety atadgotraṃ.
tgt_original: 若異此，則無功能。

src_original: atha punaḥ paryāyeṇeti vistaraḥ.  paryāyeṇāyugapat.  strīcittāt tatkāyavidūṣaṇācittaṃ tatas tatpaticittaṃ tatas tatputracittaṃ tata eva ca tadduhitṛcittaṃ tata eva ca tadupakaraṇādicittaṃ utpannaṃ  tataḥ strīcittād anaṃtarotpannebhyaś cittebhyo yad bahutaraṃ pravāhataḥ paṭutaraṃ śaktitaḥ āsannataraṃ vāsyotpādyasya cittasya.  tad eva cittam utpadyate.
tgt_original: 復次從此女人心，由別因緣生無量別心。

src_original: tadbhāvanāyā balīyastvāt tasya bahutarasya paṭutarasyāsannatarasya vā bhāvanāyā balavattaratvāt.  anyatreti vistaraḥ.
tgt_original: 於此眾心中，若心多生、明了生、最近生，從此心次第先生，是彼修習力最強故。

src_original: tatkālapratyupasthitas tatkālikaḥ kāyapratyayaviśeṣo bāhyapratyayaviśeṣaś ca.  tasmād anyatra tasmād ṛta ity arthaḥ.  tad eva hy upapadyate yasya kāyo bāhyo vā pratyayaviṣaya uptiṣṭhate.  saiva balīyasīti.  yā bahutarasya paṭutarasya āsannatarasya vābhihitā saiva balīyasi bhāvanā.
tgt_original: 除現時身外因緣差別，此心修習力強。

src_original: kasmān nityaṃ na phalati na hi tac cittaṃ nivartate.
tgt_original: 云何不恒受果？

src_original: vartata itītareṇa codita āha.  sthityanyathātvalakṣaṇatvāt.  [Tib.379b] sthiter anyathātvaṃ lakṣaṇam asyeti sthityanyathātvalakṣaṇaṃ.  tadbhāvāt.
tgt_original: 由此心有住異相故。

src_original: tasya cānyathātvasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇasya.  anyabhāvanāphalotpattau anyabhāvanāphalasya cittāntarasyotpattāv ānuguṇyān nityaṃ na phalati tad evety arthasaṃbandhaḥ.
tgt_original: 此住異相，於別修習果生中隨順功德故。

src_original: evaṃ hy āhur iti sthavirarāhulaḥ.  sarvākāram  iti sarvaprakāraṃ.  mayūracandrakasya  varṇasaṃniveśādiprakārāḥ.  kāraṇam
tgt_original: 此法相於一切心種類中，是方無間因智中諸佛世尊有自在。

src_original: sarvajñabalaṃ hi tat jñānaṃ  sarvavidbalaṃ hi taj jñānaṃ.
tgt_original: 餘人不能知，　　此智是佛力。

src_original: yena tat kāraṇaṃ jñāyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.  prāg (Abhidh-k-vy 715) evarūpiṇāṃ cittabhedānām iti.  rūpakāraṇam api sarvathā jñātum aśakyaṃ kim arūpiṇām ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 」何況無色諸心差別我等能知？

src_original: ekīyas tīrthika iti vaiśeṣikaḥ.  manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣāpekṣatvād iti cet.  syān mataṃ tulye 'py ātmaprabhavatve cittotpatter ātmā kadācit karhicin manaḥsaṃyogaviśeṣam apekṣate.
tgt_original: 有餘外道執，從我心生。 此二難，於彼外道最明了成。

src_original: ity ato na nityaṃ tādṛśam eva cittam utpadyate na ca kramaniyamenāṃkurakāṇḍapattrādivad iti.
tgt_original: 云何心不恒生同一相？ 云何不決定次第生？

src_original: iti cintayitvā tad abhimaṃtrya phūḥ svāhā phūḥ svāheti janasya darśitam.  anena mantreṇedam auṣadhaṃ sidhyatīti.  tatra yathā kuhakavaidyaphūḥsvāhānām auṣadhakāryasiddhau sāmarthyaṃ nāsti.  auṣadhasyaiva tu sāmarthyam.  evam ātmano buddhiviśeṣopattau nāsti sāmarthyaṃ.
tgt_original: 此中無有我功能隨一可知得故。 譬如藥事成時，有誑惑醫說部莎訶言。

src_original: cittasyaiva sāmarthyam iti.  saty ātmani tayoḥ saṃbhava iti cet.  syān mataṃ.
tgt_original: 若汝說： 由我有此二得成。

src_original: ity ato 'sty ātmeti.  atra brūmo vāṅmātraṃ.  nātra kācid yuktir astīti.
tgt_original: 此執但有語言。

src_original: āśrayaḥ sa iti cet.
tgt_original: 若汝言： 此我是彼依止。

src_original: syān matam.  ātmāśrayas tayor iti.
tgt_original: 若爾，於中何者是所依？

src_original: yathā kaḥ kasyāśraya iti.
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: āśrayarūpeṇodāharaṇaṃ mṛgyate.  tam asyāśrayārtham ayuktaṃ darśayann āha.  na hi te [Tib.381b] iti vistaraḥ.  te saṃskāracitte.  citrabadarādivat.  yathā kuḍye citram ādhāryaṃ badaraṃ ca kuṇḍe.  ādiśabdena bhājane bhojanam ityādi.
tgt_original: 此二非所持，譬如畫色及婆陀羅子。

src_original: naiva te saṃskāracitte tatrātmany ādheye.  nāpi sa kuḍyakuṇḍādivad ādhāro yuktaḥ.  ādiśabdena bhājanādigrahaṇaṃ.
tgt_original: 亦非能持，譬如壁及瓶。

src_original: ato 'nātmāśrayaḥ.  yathā na gandhādhibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī.
tgt_original: 若我為彼依止不如此，若不爾，云何如地大是香等依止。

src_original: tathā buddhyādibhyo 'nya ātmeti.  (Abhidh-k-vy 717) ko hi satpuruṣo gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyāṃ pṛthivīṃ nidhārayati.  na hi pṛthivī katamety ukte rūpagandharasasparśebhyo 'nyā darśayituṃ śakyate yathā rūpaṃ gandhādibhyo 'nyad iti.  yadi na gaṃdhādibhyo 'nyā pṛthivī.
tgt_original: 我今大喜此譬乃證我義，謂我無如離香等別地大不可得，於香等假名說地大。 如此於功用及心無有別我，但於此二假名說我。

src_original: katham ayaṃ vyapadeśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gandhādaya iti.
tgt_original: 何人能決了有地異於香等？

src_original: katham iti pratipādyati.  te hy eveti vistaraḥ.  te hy evety evakāras tadvytiriktapṛthivīdravyanivṛttyarthaḥ.  te eva gandhādayaḥ.  tadākhyāḥ pṛthivyākhyāḥ.
tgt_original: 若離香等無別地，云何說於地有四德？

src_original: yathā vijñāyeran.  tathā viśeṣaṇārthaṃ vyapadeśa ity abhisaṃbandhaḥ.  nānya iti.  nābādyākhyāḥ.  pṛthivyākhyebhyo 'nye vijñāyerann ity arthaḥ.
tgt_original: 為各分別彼，令他得知，香等得地等名，無別地等。

src_original: kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīravyapadeśavad iti.  yathā kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīram iti vyapadiśyate.  anyābhyo mṛnmayādiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ.  na ca kāṣṭhapratimāyāḥ śarīram anyat.
tgt_original: 譬如說木像，身形雖然，若由觀功用差別故，智有差別。

src_original: yo hi baliṣṭha iti.  saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ.  tenānyeṣāṃ saṃskāraviśeṣāṇāṃ pratibandhaḥ.
tgt_original: 若功用最強，是功用遮餘功用。

src_original: sa eva baliṣṭhaḥ kasmān nityaṃ na phalatīty ācāryavacanaṃ.
tgt_original: 若爾，是最強功用，云何不恒生果？

src_original: smṛtisaṃskārecchādveṣādīnāṃ [Tib.382b] guṇapadārthatvāt tasya ca guṇapadārthasyāvaśyadravyāśritatvād dravyāśrayaś ca guṇavān ity evaṃ lakṣaṇopadeśāt.
tgt_original: 必定應信受有我念等，由求那性故。 此求那必定依止物故，是故念依我。

src_original: samucchinnakuśalamūla eva.
tgt_original: 此善根，偈曰：

src_original: kramamaraṇāvasthāyāṃ vā.  evaṃ paurvavidehako gaudānīyaka iti.  atideśād asty anayor api kuśalamūlasamuccheda iti darśayati.  chinatti strī pumān
tgt_original: 若斷善根，唯男女能斷。 餘師說： 智根、精進根昧鈍故，女人不斷。

src_original: yaḥ strīndriyeṇa samanvāgato niyatam asāv aṣṭābhir indriyaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
tgt_original: 若人與女根相應，此人必定與八根相應。

src_original: rūpāvacarasyaikasya bhāvanāheyasyaiva.  anāsravasya ceti.
tgt_original: 見苦集修滅，是欲相應法，自界三一色，無垢識境界。

src_original: pūrvavad eva vācyaṃ.  svakādharatrayordhvaikāmalānām  iti.  svakānām adharāṇāṃ ca trayaṃ svakādharatrayaṃ ca ūrdhvaikaṃ cāmalaṃ ceti vigrahaḥ.  rūpāvacarās ta eva triprakārā dharmā iti.
tgt_original: 此法是自界法，有三部故說自界三。 此法一部是色界法，故說一色。

src_original: duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyās teṣām adhikṛtatvāt.  te 'ṣṭānāṃ cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ.
tgt_original: 於欲界相應行法，見苦集所滅及修道所滅，皆是五識境。

src_original: svadhātukānāṃ trayāṇāṃ teṣām eva duḥkhasamudayadarśanabhāvanāheyānāṃ pūrvavad vyākhyeyaṃ.
tgt_original: 於自界有三識，謂是前三色界心一，謂修道所滅及無流心。 自界下界三，上一淨識境。 於色界相應行，如前三部法，是八心所緣境，謂自界心三如前，下界心三亦如前，上界心一謂修道所滅心及無流心。

src_original: kim evaṃ.
tgt_original: 云何如此？

src_original: [Tib.141b] ṣaṇṇāṃ cittānām ālaṃbanam iti.  navānām ekādaśānāṃ ca cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīti.  rūpāvacarā nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā navānāṃ cittānām ālaṃbanaṃ bhavaṃti.  ārūpyāvacarā ekādaśānām iti.
tgt_original: 欲界相應見滅所滅法，唯六識境界，謂前所說五識及自長識。

src_original: kathaṃ.  rūpāvacarā nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā dharmāḥ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ visabhāgadhātusarvatragasaṃprayuktabhāvanāheyānāṃ trayāṇāṃ.  svadhātukānāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ dvinikāyasarvatragasaṃprayuktabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ.  ārūpyāvacarasya bhāvanāprahātavyasyākāśānaṃtyāyatanasaṃgṛhītasya.  anāsravasya cānvayajñānapakṣasya.
tgt_original: 見道所滅法亦爾，謂前所說五識及自長識。

src_original: tasyaiva cādhikasya nirodhadarśanaprahātavyasya mārgadarśanaprahātavyasya vā cittasya.  iti navānāṃ pratyekam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavaṃti.  ārūpyāvacarā api nirodhamārgadarśanaprahātavyā dharmāḥ pratyekam ekādaśānāṃ cittānām ālambanaṃ bhavaṃti.  kāmarūpāvacarāṇāṃ visabhāgadhātusarvatragasaṃprayuktabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ.
tgt_original: 如此色無色界見滅道所滅法，是見滅道所滅自長識境界故，是故為九識及十一識境。 說三界五部法已。

src_original: anāsravās tridhātvaṃtyatrayānāsravagocarā  iti.  anāsravā nirodhādayaḥ.  triṣu dhātuṣu [Tib.142a] yāny antyāni trayāṇi (Abhidh-k-vy 481) nirodhamārgadarśanabhāvanāprahātavyalakṣaṇāni.  teṣāṃ yathāyogam anāsravasya ca gocarāḥ.
tgt_original: 無流三界後，三無流心境。 若無流法為十心境界，謂三界後三部心，即見滅道修所滅心及無流心。

src_original: mithyādṛg vimatī tābhyāṃ yuktāvidyātha kevalā  nirodhamārgadṛggheyāḥ ṣaḍ anāsravagocarā  iti niyamāt.  ato na kliṣṭacittasya bhāvanālaṃbanam iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
tgt_original: 「見苦集修滅，　　於三界無流，

src_original: paṃcāṣṭadaśavijñānadaśavijñānagocarā
tgt_original: 五八及十識，　　十識所緣境，

src_original: aprayogeṇa anābhogena.  pratinivārayato 'pi niṣedhayato 'pi pudgalasya punaḥpunaḥ saṃmukhībhāvād anubadhnaṃty ato 'nuśayā iti.  āsayaṃti saṃsāra ity āsravā iti.
tgt_original: 非功用恒故者，若不作功用為生，彼若作對治為遮，彼數數現前故。

src_original: haraṃtīty oghāḥ.  śleśayantīti yogāḥ.  upagṛhṇaṃtīty upādānānīty arthapradarśanam.
tgt_original: 令住及令流，能牽及能合，能取故說彼，名流暴河等。

src_original: vahana etad rūpam oghā iti.
tgt_original: 令住不護中，從六門漏能流生死從有頂至阿毘指，故名流。

src_original: vahaṃti haraṃti gatyaṃtaraṃ viṣayāṃtaraṃ veti oghāḥ.  yojayaṃti śleṣayaṃti gatyantare viṣayāṃtare veti yogāḥ.
tgt_original: 能牽引眾生令入苦海，故名瀑河。 能合眾生令不離苦，故名繫。

src_original: upādadaty upagṛhṇaṃti punarbhave kāmādiṣu vā vijñānasaṃtatiṃ ity upādānānīti.
tgt_original: 因此眾生取欲等及生生具，故說名取。

src_original: evaṃ tu sādhīyaḥ syād iti.
tgt_original: 又若如此解，是為最勝。

src_original: evaṃ tu sādhutaraṃ syād ity ācāryaḥ.  [Tib.149a] katham ity āha.  āsravati gacchaty ebhir anuśayaiḥ saṃtatir vijñānasaṃtatir viṣayeṣv ity āsravāḥ.  karaṇasādhanaṃ.  mahatābhisaṃskāreṇa kuśalair dharmaiś cittasaṃtānaḥ pratisroto nīyate viṣayebhyo nivāryate.
tgt_original: 由彼故相續於六塵中流，故說彼名流。

src_original: saṃyojanabaṃdhanānuśayopakleśaparyavasthānabhedena [Tib.149b] punaḥ paṃcadhā bhittvoktāḥ sūtre 'bhidharme ca.  nanu cānuśayavyatiriktāny āhrīkyādīni paryavasthānāni nirdiśyaṃte.  katham idam ucyate.  anuśayā eva paryavasthānānīti.  satyaṃ bhavaṃti tadvyatiriktāni.

src_original: avyatiriktāny api tv iṣyante.  tathā hi vakṣyati.  kleśo 'pi hi haryavasthānaṃ.  kāmarāgaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata iti sūtre vacanād iti.  (V.40cd-42) evam anyāny api yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyānīti.
tgt_original: 是隨眠惑，由結、縛、隨眠、染污、倒起差別，更說五種。

src_original: pratigherṣyāmātsaryasaṃyojanāni kāmāvacarāṇi.  mānāvidyādṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsāsaṃyojanāni traidhātukāni.
tgt_original: 此中結有九種，謂隨順結、違逆結、慢結、無明結、見結、取結、疑結、嫉姤結、慳悋結。
